content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #179

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by Anthony Julian
Chapter/section: Smart launch example
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: NEG :exclamation: Clarification
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary:

Comment: Hub is not a proper noun, should not be capitalized. In addition, the document has yet to introduce a "hub" in any context except as parameters.

Existing wording: These parameters identify the Hub's base url,
Proposed wording: These parameters identify the Hub's base url,

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #179

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Will moved the following disposition, seconded by Anthony

Disposition: Persuasive with mod
Disposition Comment: Will create an abstract (more general and introductory overview as described in #181) that will define the Hub as its own entity and maintain it as capitalized throughout the spec.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
